original_title: President instructs officials to control spread of dengue in WP
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has instructed the Governor, Chief Secretary and District Secretary to mobilize the dengue task force to control the spread of dengue in the Western Province.
The President has given the instructions as the Western Province has seen a surge in dengue cases recently, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.

The President has instructed the Governor, Chief Secretary and District Secretary to mobilize the Dengue Task Force to control the spread of dengue in the Western Province with the support of the relevant institutions and the public.
